message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD

This paper deals with merging lexical resources to create a reference dictionary for text expansion in question answering. The paper discusses the classification of lexical information by sense, which is relevant to natural language processing and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses reducing noise in utterances, which is relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper's focus on enriching utterances based on meaning is also relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and semantic web (cs.SD).
